newsitem.title: USA: Spatial Technology Q4 net loss, FY96 loss.
newsitem.headline: Spatial Technology Q4 net loss, FY96 loss.

text.p: Spatial Technology Inc said Wednesday it will likely report a net loss in the $500,000 range for the fourth quarter and an overall net loss for 1996.
The company said it expects revenue of about $9.5 million, which it said is up 11 percent from the 1995 figure but below its internal expectations.
It blamed the shortfall on an unexpected drop in fourth quarter sales, to $1.9 million, down from $2.3 million a year ago.

"Through the first nine months of 1996 Spatial was performing on plan, in terms of both revenue and earnings growth. While we are disappointed with our financial performance in the fourth quarter, we remain very confident in our medium- and long-term business opportunities," the company said in a release.
The company, which licenses 3D modeling software, said its year-end audit should be completed in February.
